item.title: Yahoo - login
item.description:
Yahoo - login

Best in class Yahoo Mail, breaking local, national and global news, finance, sports, music, movies and more. You get more out of the web, you get more out of life.

item.title: Huge drug raid found so much weed that the National Guard was called in
item.description:
Huge drug raid found so much weed that the National Guard was called in

At least 40 people were arrested and 30 homes and warehouses raided in an extensive marijuana growing operation raid by Colorado law enforcement Thursday morning. All the locations raided were tied to a single pot growing operation, and most were in the Denver area, police told CBS 4.

item.title: No Need to Adjust Your Screen - This Is Definitely Taylor Swift Wearing a Minidress on Vogue
item.description:
No Need to Adjust Your Screen - This Is Definitely Taylor Swift Wearing a Minidress on Vogue

Cowboy boots, thigh-highs, leg-baring dresses - Taylor Swift's style has slowly evolved and changed over the years. And just when we thought we had it sorta figured out, the star suprised us again, this time rocking her edgiest, sparkliest, and possibly naked-est outfit ever, which was captured on the cover of Vogue's May 2016 issue.

item.title: Photos of the day - April 15, 2016
item.description:
Photos of the day - April 15, 2016

An Indian fisherman stands behind bars after being arrested by the Pakistani authorities, Karachi, Pakistan, the Tower of Juche Idea is illuminated during fireworks in Pyongyang, North Korea and a protester shout slogans in front of the Egyptian Journalists Syndicate, in Cairo, Egypt are some of the photos of the day.

item.title: Report: Johnny Manziel trashed posh L.A. pad, evidence of drug use
item.description:
Report: Johnny Manziel trashed posh L.A. pad, evidence of drug use

Now this is a Page Six story if there ever was one. According to New York Post's Emily Smith, out-of-work quarterback Johnny Manziel and his friends trashed a posh Los Angeles home they were renting and the real estate broker who discovered the damage said that there were clear signs of drug use at the house.

item.title: English Teacher Charged With Sexual Assault of a Student: 'You're My Baby Boo!'
item.description:
English Teacher Charged With Sexual Assault of a Student: 'You're My Baby Boo!'

A Wisconsin high school teacher is facing charges of sexual assault following an alleged sexual relationship with a student, including on the night of her husband's bachelor's party.

item.title: Maps of Mines & Mills in Boulder County
item.description:
Maps of Mines & Mills in Boulder County

Maps of Mines & Mills in Boulder County These maps were developed by the Boulder County Health Department as part of a study on radon gas. (See Background below). Many thanks to Susan Martino and Diana Shannon for helping make these available to the public through BASIN.
